parameter.name: url
parameter.documentation: A canonical reference to a value set.

parameter.name: valueSet
parameter.documentation: The value set is provided directly as part of the request.

parameter.name: valueSetVersion
parameter.documentation: The identifier that is used to identify a specific version of the value set to be used when generating the expansion.

parameter.name: context
parameter.documentation: The context of the value set, so that the server can resolve this to a value set to expand.

parameter.name: contextDirection
parameter.documentation: The value that informs the server whether to use the value set associated with the context for reading or writing purposes.

parameter.name: filter
parameter.documentation: A text filter that is applied to restrict the codes that are returned.

parameter.name: date
parameter.documentation: The date for which the expansion should be generated.

parameter.name: offset
parameter.documentation: The number of records in a page view for paging support.

parameter.name: count
parameter.documentation: The number of codes in a page view for paging support.

parameter.name: includeDesignations
parameter.documentation: The value that controls whether concept designations are to be included or excluded in value set expansions.

parameter.name: designation
parameter.documentation: A token that specifies a system+code that is either a use or a language.

parameter.name: includeDefinition
parameter.documentation: The value that controls whether the value set definition is included or excluded in value set expansions.

parameter.name: activeOnly
parameter.documentation: The value that controls whether inactive concepts are included or excluded in value set expansions.

parameter.name: excludeNested
parameter.documentation: The value that controls whether or not the value set expansion nests codes.

parameter.name: excludeNotForUI
parameter.documentation: The value that controls whether or not the value set expansion is assembled for a user interface use.

parameter.name: excludePostCoordinated
parameter.documentation: The value that controls whether or not the value set expansion includes post coordinated codes.

parameter.name: displayLanguage
parameter.documentation: The value that specifies the language to be used for description in the expansions.

parameter.name: exclude-system
parameter.documentation: A code system, or a particular version of a code system to be excluded from the value set expansion.

parameter.name: system-version
parameter.documentation: The value that specifies a version to use for a system, if the value set does not specify which one to use.

parameter.name: check-system-version
parameter.documentation: Edge Case: Specifies a version to use for a system. If a value set specifies a different version, an error is returned instead of the expansion.

parameter.name: force-system-version
parameter.documentation: Edge Case: Specifies a version to use for a system. This parameter overrides any specified version in the value set.
